mapper.insert: insert into comment (id, targetId, commentType, displayId, writerId,contents, dateCreated) values(#{id}, #{targetId}, #{type}, #{displayId}, #{writer.loginId}, #{contents}, #{dateCreated})
mapper.update: update comment set contents = #{contents} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: c.id as id, c.targetId as targetId, c.commentType as type, c.displayId as displayId, c.writerId as "writer.loginId", c.contents as contents, c.dateCreated as dateCreated
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM comment c where c.targetId = #{targetId} and c.commentType = #{type} order by c.id desc

SELECT
FROM comment c where c.displayId = #{displayId} and c.targetId = #{targetId} and c.commentType = #{type}

SELECT
FROM comment c join post p on p.id = c.targetId join category ca on ca.id = p.categoryId join blogs b on b.id = ca.blogId where ca.blogId = #{blogId} and c.commentType = #{type} order by c.id desc limit 1
